category.name: Column Preferences
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Mfg0MEPlantBOPRevisionColumnsShownPref
preference.preference_description: Defines the columns displayed in the base view of a plant BOP. Valid Values: Accepts the internal name of each column in the order you want them to appear. For example: value_1, value_2, and so on.
